titles: Betis Take Top Spot with Late Winner!

captions.text: Real Betis seal top spot with late winner against Valencia!
Betis take the lead with a stunning goal at 48 minutes!
Valencia's Gayà sent off in 84th minute as Betis win 1-0

summary: Real Betis secured top spot in La Liga with a 1-0 victory over Valencia, thanks to Rubén Castro Martín's late winner. The match was marred by José Luis Gayà Peña's red card in the 84th minute.

key_moments.description: Betis take the lead with a stunning goal at 48 minutes!
Gayà sent off in 84th minute as Betis win 1-0
